data.meta_description: Michael O'Brien (32) OF - Honors / Awards 2024 First-Year SEC Academic Honor Roll 2024 (Freshman Season) Season : Made 24 appearances and two starts on the y...
data.text:
Honors / Awards

2024 First-Year SEC Academic Honor Roll

2024 (Freshman Season)

Season: Made 24 appearances and two starts on the year … He earned one start as the DH and another in center field … Made eight plate appearances with five runs scored and a hit to finish with a .125 batting average.

Air Force (2/18): Entered the game at right field to make his collegiate debut. Evansville (3/9-10): Batted out a walk and scored a run in the series. Ole Miss (4/12-14): Made first collegiate start … Grabbed five plate appearances and came away with a run scored through the series. Arkansas (5/11-12): Played in center field and pinch ran on the weekend. North Alabama (5/14): Made second start of the season in center field … Scored a run and made a pair of plate appearances. Missouri (5/16-18): Earned a single at bat in the series. Vanderbilt (5/23): Entered the game as a pinch runner. St. John’s (5/31): Scored a run in the game.

High School

Played at John Curtis Christian in River Ridge, Louisiana, for coach Jeff Curtis … Helped earn the district title and a runner-up finish in his Junior year as an outfielder and a pitcher … Hit two home runs while also pitching five innings and only giving up one unearned run in the process on senior night … Awarded All-District, All-Metro and All-Metro MVP honors during that junior season, while also accumulating an all-state selection and league MVP honors during his high school career … Earned a state title in football his senior season as well.

Personal

Full name is Michael Dennis O’Brian … Born on January 20, 2004, in Marrero, Louisiana … Son of Michael and Shannon, and brother to Kennedy … His dad, Michael, played football at Tulane and his Uncle Johnny played baseball at Northwestern … Majoring in Business Administration.
